entries.headline: Phase 2: Chosen One
entries.content:
It is a great honor to have been chosen as the potentiate for the Hydris Protocols! Of all those who might be worthy, and it is I who the Archon has named.

Upon reflection, I do find it a bit strange. Unnerving. Almost as if there my colleagues have some clandestine motive, as yet undefined.

Schemers! I don’t trust any of them!

entries.headline: Phase 2: Appropriate Selection
entries.content:
My excitement continues to build as we near the execution of the Hydris Protocols, although I find it a bit unsettling that I was selected to be infused by the most unpredictable and unstable of all of the elements.

The Archon has encouraged me not to read anything into it. I mean, why would I possibly fail to trust such a disingenuous misguided bureaucrat?! Does he think me such a fool?

entries.headline: Phase 2: Unstable Transcendence
entries.content:
It is only hours before I am to make my final transformation. I can feel the others looking at me all the time.

Is it pity? Fear? No, wait. I know. It’s jealousy. They covet the honor for which I have been chosen! Well, I don’t blame them. Who wouldn’t want to become as a god? It’s such a great burden.

And a terrible god I shall be! I will destroy them all!
